posts.post_content: I will accept $900 for the next 24 hrs., otherwise it goes to ebay for $1000 tomorrow night.

Somebody start the ball rolling with an offer. Let's start at $800 and see where we end up. A cash and trade offer wouldn't necessarily be out of the question. I need HOF'ers graded (autographed and not).
Let's talk!
Last chance before it goes to ebay on Tues. night. Make an offer, let's talk. Someone out there has to need it or an upgrade from your beater.
